text: The 2015–16 Essex Senior Football League season is the 45th in the history of Essex Senior Football League, a football competition in England. ==Essex Senior League== The league consists of 21 clubs. The following 1 club left the league – *Haringey Borough – promoted to Isthmian League Division One North The following 2 clubs joined the league – *Burnham Ramblers – relegated from Isthmian League Division One North *Wadham Lodge – promoted from Essex Olympian League Premier Division In addition, Greenhouse London changed their name to Greenhouse Sports. Redbridge were initially relegated from Isthmian League Division One North, however, they were later reprieved by the FA's league committee.http://www.isthmian.co.uk/redbridge-reprieved-ware-moved-in- fa-reshuffle-24742 Three clubs have applied for promotion to Step 4: Bowers & Pitsea, FC Romania and Ilford. ===League table=== ==References== 2015-16 9
title: 2015–16 Essex Senior Football League
